text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-ingredient-manufacturer-role-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplay
http://hl7.org/fhir/ingredient-manufacturer-role5.0.0  actualManufacturer actually makes this particular ingredient
http://hl7.org/fhir/ingredient-manufacturer-role5.0.0  allowedManufacturer is specifically allowed for this ingredient
http://hl7.org/fhir/ingredient-manufacturer-role5.0.0  possibleManufacturer is known to make this ingredient in general

name: R5IngredientManufacturerRoleForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.IngredientManufacturerRole for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ingredient-manufacturer-role|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ingredient-manufacturer-role|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Ingredient.manufacturer.role` as Required

Across FHIR versions, the value set has been mapped as:
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ingredient-manufacturer-role|5.0.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ingredient-manufacturer-role|4.3.0`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:
All concepts in the comparison are listed as identical.
The source and target value sets have the same number of active concepts (3).
FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ingredient-manufacturer-role|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
